items.kid_gloss: The brain changes as you learn.
items.hook_question: How does your brain adapt when you learn new things?
items.mini_task: Try learning a new skill, like juggling.

items.kid_gloss: These neurons help us understand others.
items.hook_question: Why do you feel excited when others do?
items.mini_task: Watch someone dance and try to mimic them.

items.hook_question: Why do you feel sleepy at night?
items.mini_task: Track your sleep schedule for a week.
